revised_title: Preliminary Report on Chemical and Geological Work on Board H.M.S. 'Challenger'
tldr: This article discusses the chemical and geological work conducted on board the H.M.S. 'Challenger' expedition. The author describes the methods and instruments used to collect and analyze ocean water samples, including the slip water-bottle and hydrometer. The article also touches upon the determination of the specific gravity of ocean water and the importance of reducing the results to a common temperature for comparison.
